verses.verse: There's a wideness in God's mercy, Like the wideness of the sea; There's a kindness in His justice, Which is more than liberty.
For the love of God is broader Than the measure of man's mind, And the heart of the Eternal Is most wonder fully kind.
If our love were but more simple, We should take Him at His word; And our lives would be all sunshine In the sweetness of our Lord.
